alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 7:40AM EDT until September 08 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lafayette County in Big Bend Florida... Central Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Northeastern Taylor County in Big Bend Florida... Southern Madison County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 830 AM EDT. * At 739 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles south of Monticello, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Ambient weather station in the Big Bend Wildlife Preserve gusted to 57mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Ebb, Lamont, Buckville, Eridu, Thomas City, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Cooks Hammock, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Chancey, Secotan, Boyd, and Smith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
